website_summaries.verdict: This budget telescoping gaff saves space on your boat and can hook to anything for security in rough water. Be sure to clean it after use, though, because it tends to rust.
pros: Telescoping gaff extends from 30 to 46 inches
cons: Gaff may rust, so be sure to clean and dry it after use

customer_reviews.title: What I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Still in a bit of a shock from when I first searched for a gaff! I had no idea what was out there. Learned a lot about cross dressing that I never wanted to know. Thank you Amazon. I got this because I wanted to start fishing with jug lines and this was a great way to extend my reach from the pontoon boat to grab the lines. My wife can drive the boat and not worry about being 100% on the spot close enough for me to reach the lines and I don’t have to worry about leaning over and falling in. Over all gets my recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: FireRobTop Contributor: Baseball

customer_reviews.title: JUNK!!!
customer_reviews.text: On the very first gaff attempt, the gaff came apart and half of it sunk to the bottom. And yes, it was tight. Now all I have left is a piece that I can use to beat myself over the head for wasting my money on this junk!
customer_reviews.author: E. Talbot

customer_reviews.title: Too dull, 4 point tip. Not tapered
customer_reviews.text: The only problem with this gaff is that the tip is not tapered. It’s simply an aluminum hook with a 4 edge point, which makes it very difficult to get a good gaff shot without putting everything thing you’ve got in it. It takes two hands and a very solid yank to puncture the scales of snapper, grouper, or other reef fish. This causes inexperienced fishermen onboard the boat to lose fish which would be easily landed with a tapered point gaff.
customer_reviews.author: Jt

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: This gaff works great! I love the adjustable handle - makes it easy to stow on the boat. I was a little concerned when buying that an adjustable gaff would be sturdy enough to hold up while bring fish in. Well rest assured it is, we boat 10 king macks, 2 jack crevelle and 2 five ft blacktips with ease. Also the point is VERY sharp.
customer_reviews.author: B C

customer_reviews.title: Nice gaft that doesnt eat up boat space!
customer_reviews.text: Nice small telescoping gaft. Doesn't take up much room on the boat. Have had it for about 6 months with saltwater use without rusting or other malfunctions. It is only used lightly on my 25 ft center console proline . Wish I would catch more large fish but that's not the gaft fault. Really nice storage gaft that wont take up too much space on your boat and is made with quality parts that wont fall apart on you. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: j brad g

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: SO this is the first gaff I have ever purchased. Feels really sturdy. I was concerned that the telescope feature would not make it so. It can quickly be extended and locked into place. Comes with a clear plastic cover for the hook. Now I just gotta catch some fish to gaff !
customer_reviews.author: Calidad

customer_reviews.title: Does well for small to medium fish
customer_reviews.text: This works good for most fish they catch. I will be getting another one with a wider hook for larger fish. We mostly salt water fish.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This is a beauty. Similar gaff at our local sporting goods is priced over $40 and doesn't have a strap or even a cover for the hook. This one has it all - big and sturdy. All around perfect. Even has a clip that could hook it onto your backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Liane

customer_reviews.title: This thing rusted before we ever used it. Mine ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing rusted before we ever used it. Mine was also a bit wonky from the factory. I had to "fix" it so the thing would lock and not slide - makes grabbing a fish tough if not fixed.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: made very strong and compact.... VERY BAD JOB ON THE POINT..!!!
customer_reviews.text: handle looks and is made strong... hook on the other hand.... very very bad job on the point. NOT SHARP AT ALL !!!! VERY CRUDE JOB. Spent almost 45 minutes re doing the point.
customer_reviews.author: H. Ivan Oorloff

customer_reviews.title: This is also at fault for no fish
customer_reviews.text: Makes a cool decoration for the boat to make people think your a fisherman along with that stupid knife and table
customer_reviews.author: William Henley

customer_reviews.title: Hook must be Carbon Steel
customer_reviews.text: The "stainless" hook has rusted to the point that it looks like it will not be able to withstand a large fish....if I ever can catch one! Getting a different gaff.
customer_reviews.author: Eejit

customer_reviews.title: Rusted hook after two months.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this two months and it the hook is already rusting. A LOT. Nice handle but the hook is very low grade. Would not buy again. Now I have to find a good stainless hook for the handle.
customer_reviews.author: gg37

customer_reviews.title: Extends smoothly and can handle pulling weight
customer_reviews.text: Sharp, extends smoothly and feels fairly solid. Got this to help reel in my crab traps if it gets stuck on rocks where i go crabbing. Works perfectly for that use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not stick when trying to pull in a fish
customer_reviews.text: Used and it was unable to penetrate anywhere on a king fish. Worthless
customer_reviews.author: Quibbly

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Gaff Hook
customer_reviews.text: Good Quality Gaff Hook, have used it a couple of times since it was delivered and it appears to be holding up good.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Utz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Only thing is that you might want to sharpen the point of the gaff
customer_reviews.author: Auggiesaucedo

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I returned because the gaff started to rust without even touching the water.
customer_reviews.author: Dmitry

customer_reviews.title: Gaff hook is aluminum and dull as can be
customer_reviews.text: Gaff hook is aluminum and dull as can be. Dont know what good it would do to sharpen, planned on gaffing big buffallo carp and gar. Aluminum tip will just dull itself against there thick scales.
customer_reviews.author: james beck

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Lightweight. Has a clip to attach to whatever you want. Sharp out of the box. Sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Jedi Firefighter

customer_reviews.title: Hook snapped on first use
customer_reviews.text: The two rivets attaching the hook to the pole snapped upon first use. We are now cruising in the Bahamas and unable to return. Gaff not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Myles

customer_reviews.title: Great gaff at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great working gaff! Just hauled in a 24 lb carp with it yesterday while bowfishing. Quality and build are very sturdy and expect it to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Woz

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaff
customer_reviews.text: Works great for grabbing crab pot buoys out of the water.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: For the price seems good..
customer_reviews.text: For the price seems good... I hope to gaffe a halibut tomorrow ...I did put a file to it no biggy.
customer_reviews.author: BRIAN F OWENS

customer_reviews.title: Great Gaff at any price point
customer_reviews.text: Great Gaff at any price point. Works great for pulling 30+ carp into boat.
customer_reviews.author: Iowa Geek

customer_reviews.title: Seems super solid and I love the portability of it
customer_reviews.text: Seems super solid and I love the portability of it. If only I could catch a fish big enough to use it on.
customer_reviews.author: watchlover

customer_reviews.title: The hook starting to rust even before been used, ...
customer_reviews.text: The hook starting to rust even before been used, just of moisture in the air, suppose to be made of stainless steel, but...
customer_reviews.author: Victor Alperin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't know yet but will tell you soon when I hook a big one!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, not for large fish use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Gaff in the first place because of the telescoping handle. I thought it would save space, however this Gaff instantly broke in half on first use when trying to pull a king mackerel out of the water. I had to resort to using my boat hook instead.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: its made good and a lot cheaper then other ive seen
customer_reviews.author: neta

customer_reviews.title: ... be very well built I believe it will work great
customer_reviews.text: haven't used it yet but seems to be very well built I believe it will work great
customer_reviews.author: john allen

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Easy n long enough great gift for new boat owner
customer_reviews.author: Mary F. Esser

customer_reviews.title: Second time I used it it failed
customer_reviews.text: second time I sunk it in a big Ray it pulled it apart and away went the end with the hook... Crap...
customer_reviews.author: adam durland

customer_reviews.title: The telescope gaf did not work for us, the ...
customer_reviews.text: The telescope gaf did not work for us, the gaf piece came off when we tried to gaf the fish. We had made sure we had it tight and it still came off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, compact, and strong. Got this for my kayak for Halibut.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: A great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I thought it may be cheap made but I was wrong, it has held up to 12 pounders with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Singleton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: A quality item that suits my needs to a tee.
customer_reviews.author: joe

product_meta.title: KUFA Sports Telescope Hand Gaff for Fishing (46" to 30") AGF-2
